item.description:
Baraka Cafe?

A hidden gem located close to Central Square, Cambridge, MA.

Traditional Algerian-Tunisian and North African Cuisine in a cozy comfortable setting.

You will feel like you are at your close friend's home and not a restaurant.

A sophisticated restaurant.

Try the cafe's Signature Lemonade.

Please arrive 10 minutes early to be seated.

They only except CASH ONLY - NO CREDIT CARDS?.

Parking is free on Sunday.

18% gratuity added to parties of 6 or more.

If taking the MBTA take the Red Line to Central Square, once there go to Pearl Street, about two and 1/2 blocks down.

Any questions feel free to email me? - Jo-Ann
item.how_to_find_us: Allan and myself wiill be inside with a meet-up sign

group.name: Breakfast, Brunch, Lunch, & Dinner Meetup Group
